title: Finally! We are going to have SO much MILK!

tasks.task: Raising and Caring for Mini Jersey Cattle
subtasks: Searching for a suitable Bull to breed the cows
Ensuring the Bull is Disease-free and the right size
Dealing with the challenges of obtaining a suitable Bull
Adapting to unforeseen circumstances and trusting in the journey
Owning and caring for a Mini Jersey Bull calf (Trap)
Feeding and bottle-feeding the Bull calf
Ensuring proper behavior and training the Bull calf
Creating a new shelter for the Bull calf
Providing adequate nutrition and water for the animals
Participating in feeding and care routines for other farm animals
Breeding Cows and maintaining the breeding cycle
Caring for pregnant cows and preparing them for calving
Ensuring all farm animals have proper housing and shelter
Maintaining and improving the farm's facilities and equipment
